resources.string: Please enter the author name you want to use for newly inserted annotations.
Annotations will be embedded in the PDF and remain editable.
Annotations will be rendered in the PDF and not be editable.
The PDF will not contain any annotations.
Type value or pick from list
Certificate chain could not be verified, as no trusted keys were supplied.
General failure while trying to determine document integrity.
Invalid signature — since signing the content of this document, it has been modified, tampered with, or corrupted.
The revision covered by this signature has not been modified, however changes have been made to the document since it was signed.
The signature is valid and the content of this document has not been modified since it was signed.
Document integrity success, but certificate is self signed.
It was signed by %1$s on %2$s at %3$s.
It claims to have been signed by %1$s on %2$s at %3$s.
It claims to have been signed on %1$s at %2$s.
Signature is valid, but there are some warnings.
The document could not be saved.
An unknown error has occurred while trying to open this file.
Invalid date/time: please ensure that the date/time exists. Field [%1$s] should match format %2$s
The value entered does not match the format of the field [%1$s]
Invalid value: must be greater than or equal to %1$s and less than or equal to %2$s.
Invalid value: must be greater than or equal to %1$s.
Invalid value: must be less than or equal to %1$s.
Entered text could not be converted to an Integer nor URL.
Enter page index or a http:// address to link to an URL.
There are no applications installed that can open PDF documents.

It seems you have permanently denied file system access for this app. In order to view and open PDF files stored on your device, you need to manually enable file system permission via the app settings screen.
Are you sure you want to delete this annotation?
The document could not be redacted.
Applying redactions will permanently remove the information and can\'t be undone.
Text-to-speech service unavailable. Make sure you have an active internet connection or Google Text-to-speech engine installed and enabled on your device.
